Name: Happy Numbers
About the game: Happy Numbers is a relaxing, mind-blending, minimalist puzzle game that offer over 70 hand-crafted levels to immerse your self into. The game also constain a lot of beautiful characters to unlock. Let's train your brain and get the beautiful girls. YAY!!! How to play: ❥ Fill the grid by mouse dragging over cells with a number inside. ❥ Green highlighted indicates that you can slide. ❥ Red highlighted indicates indicates you cannot slide. Easy to play but not easy to win. Let's try it out !!!
